#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#define N 10001

using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int n,q;
	scanf("%d%d",&n,&q);
	int i,j;
	int lane[n];
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	     scanf("%d",&lane[i]);
	for(i=0;i<q;i++)
	{
		int x,y;
		scanf("%d%d",&x,&y);
		int count=0;
		int arr[N]={0};
		for(j=x-1;j<y;j++)
		{
			if(arr[lane[j]]==0)
			     {
			     	arr[lane[j]]++;
			     	count++;
			     }
		}
		printf("%d\n",count);
	}
	return 0;
}
